About afcapel.com

Hi, I’m Alberto Fernández-Capel and this is my personal website. I’m a web developer specialised in Ruby and JavaScript.

I’m currently bootstraping a meal planner web application called Gazpacho. Check it out!

You can find me on Twitter or Github.
